author: _jmc_.
content:
We haven't been recording.
The idea was to have a very informal opportunity to bounce our stupidest questions around - ppl generally don't feel comfortable doing that when they're recorded.

author: potuz
content: Are notes being kept in one place?

author: _jmc_.
content: We are each making individual notes in the cohort one github and <@818957367978885142> has started a light client R&D repo (https://github.com/ethereum-cdap/cohort-one/blob/master/notes/Light-Clients-R&D.md) where we are now starting to collectively  pool info.

author: potuz
content: I have an unrelated question about these zoom meetings. Is there any reason why they're not held directly here in this Discord server? Is there a lot of Spam?

author: potuz
content: It sort of I feel that I'm lurking enough that I'd see people in a room called "light client call" and just jump in. Admittedly it's useless except for those that just want to hear

author: _jmc_.
content: there's no specific reason behind this except that it when it started it was just Jin and I chatting and we defaulted to Zoom. We can certainly change to discord if its the preferred option.
